Football (College)
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: Michigan’s defensive coordinator, Greg Mattison, and head coach, Brady Hoke, first coached together in 1984; their team is 10-2 heading into Tuesday’s Sugar Bowl against Virginia Tech.
snippet: Michigan’s defensive coordinator, Greg Mattison, and head coach, Brady Hoke, first coached together in 1984; their team is 10-2 heading into Tuesday’s Sugar Bowl against Virginia Tech.
